de.polygonal.ds.ArrayConvert

type
class
Helper class for converting arrays to various collections.

Static Methods

toArray2<T>(x : Array<toArray2.T>, w : Int, h : Int) : Array2<toArray2.T>

Converts the array x into a two-dimensional array with width w and height h.

toArray3<T>(x : Array<toArray3.T>, w : Int, h : Int, d : Int) : Array3<toArray3.T>

Converts the array x into a two-dimensional array with width w and height h.

toArrayedQueue<T>(x : Array<toArrayedQueue.T>) : ArrayedQueue<toArrayedQueue.T>

Converts the array x into an arrayed queue.

toArrayedStack<T>(x : Array<toArrayedStack.T>, ?maxSize : Int) : ArrayedStack<toArrayedStack.T>

Converts the array x into an arrayed stack with a size constraint of maxSize.

toDLL<T>(x : Array<toDLL.T>, ?maxSize : Int) : DLL<toDLL.T>

Converts the array x into a doubly linked list with a size constraint of maxSize.

toLinkedQueue<T>(x : Array<toLinkedQueue.T>, ?maxSize : Int) : LinkedQueue<toLinkedQueue.T>

Converts the array x into a linked queue.

toLinkedStack<T>(x : Array<toLinkedStack.T>, ?maxSize : Int) : LinkedStack<toLinkedStack.T>

Converts the array x into a linked stack with a size constraint of maxSize.

toSLL<T>(x : Array<toSLL.T>, ?maxSize : Int) : SLL<toSLL.T>

Converts the array x into a singly linked list with a size constraint of maxSize.

toVector<T>(x : Array<toVector.T>, ?maxSize : Int) : Vector<toVector.T>

Converts the array x into a vector with a size constraint of maxSize.
